General.Name: Zhongyeda Electric Co Ltd
General.Description: Zhongyeda Electric Co., Ltd. engages in the distribution of industrial electrical products in China. It also produces and sells system integration products. In addition, the company engages in the research and development, design, manufacture, processing, and sale of high and low voltage power equipment and accessories, ships electrical equipment, new energy electrical equipment, lighting products and supporting equipment, filters, electric vehicle charging equipment, power automation protection equipment, electrical components, electrical machinery and equipment, and electronic products. Further, it offers telephone communication equipment, instruments and meters, metal processing machinery, industrial special equipment, construction machinery, metal materials, hardware tools, electrical equipment, household appliances, and chemical raw materials; and electrical machinery and equipment maintenance services. Additionally, the company imports and exports goods and technology. Zhongyeda Electric Co., Ltd. was founded in 2000 and is headquartered in Shantou, China.
General.Address: No. 1, Zhujin Yiheng Street, Shantou, China, 515000
